sqlMap.statement:
SELECT T3.ID, T3.TRANSACTIONKEY, T1.PARTY_ID, T1.ORGANKEY, T1.PARTY_CLASS_CD, T3.NAME, T1.COUNTRY_CD, T1.CARD_TYPE, T1.CARD_NO FROM T52_B_REMOUNT T3 LEFT JOIN T47_PARTY T1 ON T3.PARTY_ID = T1.PARTY_ID
ORGANKEY IN ($organkeys$)
PARTY_ID = #party_id_s#
PARTY_CLASS_CD = #party_class_cd_s#
CARD_TYPE LIKE '%'||#card_type_s# ||'%'
CARD_NO = #card_no_s#
ORGANKEY = #organkey#
PARTY_CHN_NAME LIKE '%'||#party_chn_name#||'%'

SELECT COUNT(1)
from t52_b_remount t3 left join t47_party T1 on t3.party_id = T1.party_id
ORGANKEY IN ($organkeys$)
PARTY_ID = #party_id_s#
PARTY_CLASS_CD = #party_class_cd_s#
CARD_TYPE LIKE '%'||#card_type_s# ||'%'
CARD_NO = #card_no_s#
ORGANKEY = #organkey#
PARTY_CHN_NAME LIKE '%'||#party_chn_name#||'%'

SELECT A.TX_GO_COUNTRY,A.TX_GO_AREA,A.HOST_CUST_ID,A.CASH_IND,A.CURR_CD,A.TX_OCCUR_COUNTRY ,A.TX_OCCUR_AREA,A.OPP_COUNTRY,A.OPP_AREA,A.OPP_ORGANNAME,A.AGENT_NAME,A.AGENT_COUNTRY,A.ORG_TRANS_RELA, A.AGENT_CARD_TYPE,A.AGENT_CARD_NO, A.TRANSACTIONKEY,A.CB_PK,A.TX_NO,A.ORGANKEY,A.TX_DT,A.DT_TIME,A.ACCT_NUM,A.PARTY_ID, A.PARTY_CLASS_CD,A.TX_CD,A.CB_TX_CD,A.BUS_TYPE_CD,A.TX_TYPE_CD,A.DEBIT_CREDIT,A.RECEIVE_PAY_CD, A.SUBJECTNO,A.CURRENCY_CD,A.AMT,A.CNY_AMT,A.USD_AMT,A.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,A.REMIT_TYPE_CD,A.DES, A.OVERAREA_IND,A.SETTLE_TYPE_CD,A.USE_DES,A.OPP_SYS_ID,A.OPP_AREA,A.OPP_ORGAN_TYPE,A.OPP_ORGANKEY,A.OPP_PBC_PARTY_CLASS_CD, A.OPP_PARTY_ID,A.OPP_NAME,A.OPP_ACCT_NUM,A.OPP_TX_DT,A.OPP_ACCT_TYPE_CD,A.OPP_CARD_TYPE,A.OPP_CARD_NO, A.OPP_PARTY_CLASS_CD,A.BATCH_IND,A.TELLER,A.RE_IND,A.HANDLE_STATUS_CD,A.PARTY_CHN_NAME,A.ADDTIONAL, A.VOUCHER_NO,A.HOST_CUST_ID,A.OPP_OFF_SHORE_IND,A.CAL_IND,A.VALIDATE_IND2,A.VALIDATE_IND,A.TSCTKEY, (CASE WHEN A.VALIDATE_IND IS NULL AND A.VALIDATE_IND2 IS NULL THEN '0' WHEN A.VALIDATE_IND IS NOT NULL AND A.VALIDATE_IND2 IS NULL THEN '1' WHEN A.VALIDATE_IND IS NULL AND A.VALIDATE_IND2 IS NOT NULL THEN '2' WHEN A.VALIDATE_IND IS NOT NULL AND A.VALIDATE_IND2 IS NOT NULL THEN '3' END) AS VALIDATE_FLAG
,CARD_STYLE,CARD_NO,RCV_PAY_TYPE,RCV_PAY_NO,NON_DEPT_TYPE,EQPT_CD,BANK_PAY_CD
FROM V47_TRANSACTION A
A.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
A.ORGANKEY IN ($organkeystr$)
A.BUS_TYPE_CD LIKE #bus_type_cd#
A.TRANSACTIONKEY = #transactionkey#
A.ACCT_NUM = #acct_num#
A.PARTY_ID = #party_id#
A.CASH_TRANS_FLAG = #cash_trans_flag#
A.CHANNEL = #channel#
A.DEBIT_CREDIT = #debit_credit#
A.OVERAREA_IND = #overarea_ind#
A.RE_IND = #re_ind#
A.ADDTIONAL = #addtional#
A.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
A.VALIDATE_IND2 = #validate_ind#
(A.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind# OR A.VALIDATE_IND2 = #validate_ind#)
A.PARTY_CLASS_CD = #party_class_cd#
A.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
A.TELLER = #teller#
A.OPP_PARTY_CLASS_CD = #opp_party_class_cd#
ORDER BY A.TX_DT DESC
ORDER BY A.TX_DT
ORDER BY A.PARTY_ID
ORDER BY A.ACCT_NUM
ORDER BY A.ORGANKEY
ORDER BY A.TELLER
ORDER BY A.TX_CD
ORDER BY A.AMT
ORDER BY A.ADDTIONAL
ORDER BY A.CHANNEL
,A.TX_DT DESC,A.TX_NO ASC
DESC
,A.TX_DT DESC,A.TX_NO ASC

SELECT count(*) FROM V47_TRANSACTION A
A.CHANNEL = #channel#
A.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
A.ORGANKEY IN ($organkeystr$)
A.PARTY_CLASS_CD = #party_class_cd#
A.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
A.TELLER = #teller#
A.BUS_TYPE_CD LIKE #bus_type_cd#
B.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
A.TRANSACTIONKEY = #transactionkey#
A.ACCT_NUM = #acct_num#
A.PARTY_ID = #party_id#
A.CASH_TRANS_FLAG = #cash_trans_flag#
A.DEBIT_CREDIT = #debit_credit#
A.OVERAREA_IND = #overarea_ind#
A.RE_IND = #re_ind#
A.ADDTIONAL = #addtional#
A.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
A.VALIDATE_IND2 = #validate_ind#
(A.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind# OR A.VALIDATE_IND2 = #validate_ind#)
A.OPP_PARTY_CLASS_CD = #opp_party_class_cd#
SELECT ID, SOURCE_ID, NAME, REC_TYPE, GENDER, CODE, CARD_TYPE, CARD_NO, SOURCE_LIST, FILETYPE, FILEDATE FROM T52_B_RECORDS_LIST T WHERE T.ID IN ( SELECT T.ID FROM T52_B_REMOUNT T )
